title: Australian diary. No. 104
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: an insight into the art of the furrier; life saving serum is milked from deadly snakes as an antidote to snake-bite and a modern farm is run by a group of Mission Sisters.
